img_above_text:
Defeat this third frog menace, and you'll gain another Tadpole and other materials to upgrade your Spirits and gear.
Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang
img_below_text:
You can head up the canyon past where the frog miniboss was to find some plants to harvest and a path leading into a large forested field where the Towers of Karma are, but first we'll head back to the main road.
![Wukong Felicity 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/83/Wukong_Felicity_13.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy canyon landscape from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The player character is seen walking through the snow-covered terrain, likely heading towards a new area after defeating a frog miniboss. The context suggests that the player is exploring the canyon to find plants to harvest and a path leading to a large forested field with the Towers of Karma, before returning to the main road.
